response.original_title: Israel Inside: How a Small Nation Makes a Big Difference
response.overview: Israel Inside explores core Israeli character strengths that enable the country to succeed against incredible odds. Through the story of former Harvard lecturer, Dr. Tal Ben Shahar, the film uncovers how despite various challenges, Israeli creativity and innovation advance Israeli society, while simultaneously helping make the world a better place.
response.title: Israel Inside: How a Small Nation Makes a Big Difference
